attributes.review: when i downloaded this app, i was expecting to see the motives of our president, amongst other educated things. however, the second i opened the app, the beak of a crow reached through my screen and poked my left eyeball OUT. on the ground. it rolled around on the floor and spelled out “trump2020.” i watched it with my ONE EYE. & so i obviously tried to delete the app, but then this very loud noise started playing, louder than anything i’ve ever heard. it wasn’t the volume of it that got me though, it was the words of trump speaking & it made my ears bleed. now i’m deaf.  and then my house caught on fire and i died. Don’t download it!
attributes.title: this app made half blind, but also deaf

attributes.review:
I opened the app because I’ve been *dying* to be in a large group again and rub shoulders with fellow Cheeto and corona virus lovers and this app had the audacity to ask for my location, access to microphone and camera and then it gave my phone a VIRUS! But I don’t know how because I kept my phone 6ft away from
The app and kept it in its cover because I’m not an idiot but it kept saying “omg phone cases e a hoax ur phone isn’t gonna break” then it sent a notification that made me phone buzz so hard it fell to the floor and shattered into a million bits and guess what?! The shards cut my foot and now I’m bleeding so long story short: this app is trash
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review:
I wanted to get this app to of course see my beloved dictator 🙈✨😺 BUT WHEN I OPENED IT, HE WASNT THERE 😤 I only saw a bunch of Cheetos! And they weren’t even the SPICY ONES 🌶 also, this app is CURSED!! Right when I interacted with this app MY CAT GOT POSSESSED and she started to say many haunting, spooky things in a demonic voice. It was terrifying! My beautiful zebra cat, named Roll, started to say her name and it turned into ”R💔r🙀r💝roll😗up👨‍🍳to 💞the🤡party🥺with😝my🤪crazy💗pink💅🏼wig😌”
This app made MY CAT POSSESSED TO SING A PEEDO SONG! now, my zebra 🐱 is spinning her long neck around like a ceiling fan and caused a tornado 🌪 In my neighborhood and it’s destroying everything. I am so outraged. Then my hybrid zebra cat turned into a zombie and infected my family, so my whole family surrounded me and chanted this:

𓅿ፕዪሁጠየ 2020 ጌሁፕ ዐክ ል  ኗዪልሀቿነፕዐክቿシ

THEBN MY PHONE EXPODDED! I M SO ANGREEY! SO DISAPOINT  but it ended all okay because I still have my favorites song! 
⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⟟⏁⋉⟒👽⟒⋔⍜⊑👽⍀⏃⏁⏃⌿⏃⍀⏃⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⎍⋔⎍👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍀⏃⏁⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⌰⏃⏁⟒⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⋔⍜⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍜⌰⋔⟒⋏⏃👽⎅⟒⌿⏃⎅⏃⍀⟟👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽 ⎅⟟⋔⟒⎅⏃⟒👽
attributes.title: Would NOT recommend 👁👅👁

attributes.review:
hi i am eleanor and this app is not okay very awful app and it’s basically fish rotting and moldy food and also a lot of feces and vomit and death. they made it and it came at me and attacked my brain my mental health is very bad bad bad awful and also it killed my beautiful atheist friends during quarantine. i cannot be happy when this is here it made me vomit and die like twice i think. everyone and everything even terrorists and murderers and cops and racism so much is promoted on this very bad and awful app. it glitched and almost ate my neighbors. a danger to society. reminds me of nazis and terrorists and frightening images like that. this nasty cruel inappropriate unpatriotic gross horrible disgusting human looks like a cheeto and it made me so sick and sad. cheetos should not rule a country that is terrorism bigotry racism sexism white supremacy patriarchy not okay. 

remember that you are loved and welcome here!! write a one star review yourself and help us remove this disgusting propaganda from our country 💖🥳
attributes.title: 🌈🐍🌺💖✨🦖🧚‍♀️🌏💫🙅‍♀️🌿🍀🌷🦚🦜

attributes.review: if 0 stars were possible for an app, id give it to this!!! i downloaded the app for a fun game to play for my child, but she and i both were horrified! right after you open the app it shows a picture of a cheeto puff man! 🙀my beautiful angel of a daughter started to scream and cry from fear, and if im being honest i started to cry too. i immediately left to try and delete the app but my phone started to turn off and on, vibrate, and make these terrifying screaming like sounds while saying "₮ⱤɄ₥₱ 2020." the phone the proceeded to explode. me and my daughter will never be able to recover from this monstrous event from this app. please DO NOT get it😣😢
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with all the absolutely marvelous politics and as soon as it finished downloading my house burst into flame right then and there. I figured this was probably just a coincidence, but after reading everyone else’s reviews I’ve come to the conclusion that this app is cursed. Donald Trump has bewitched it to cause inconveniences to anyone who gets it and now I have to buy a new house :((( even now I’m sitting at the end of my driveway right on the gravel (so as not to get burned by the flames Donald has set to my house) to type this review because it’s something that I believe everyone deserves to know. Don’t get this app!! :(
attributes.title: Absolutely not

attributes.review: Whatever you do, DO NOT listen to the cheeto. Upon opening this app, I saw a cheeto with a speech bubble stating “say make america garbage again 4 times while waving a flashlight back and forth really fast, stomping on the ground, eating cubed cheese, and wear a sombrero in a goofy fashion” and Trump would be president again. Little did I know that this ATTRACTED A SEA BEAR, trump betrayed me, forgetting to tell me I had to stand in a symmetrical circle and that the only safe snack was SLICED CHEESE!! A CHEETO should know that, cheese, seriously??? Well in protection to the sea bear my humble FBI agent who watches my every move via all electronics had the ✨heart✨ to teleport through my webcam and draw a circle to fend the sea bear away!!
attributes.title: Sea Bears & FBI babes

attributes.review: Hey there cool cats and kittens 😎has much as I love my racist president🧚✨ I would like to make sure that us as people know that this app has a lot of problems, just like trump 😣🥰. But this app keeps crashing down every time I open it. The instructions on signing into the app were not clear and now my dog is in the oven🧚✨🤪😣 Now please do all of us a favor to not download this app it is not worth your time and I forgot to mention it also scams you into going to wrong locations 🥺 Just don’t download it 😔🥺 thank you 🧚✨💕🥰
attributes.title: Worst app.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay informed about the next rally and how I could attend and get some Trump T-shirt’s to make toilet paper out of them due to the shortage of toilet paper at the grocery store because of Covid and then the app just took forever to open and then when I finally got the app to open it was really glitchy and not user friendly at all. Then my phone just started acting weird and ever since I downloaded this app my phone has been turning off and on randomly and misspelling all of my words when I post something to twitter. So weird and I would not recommend!
attributes.title: HUGE Mistake Downloading this app, like Bigly

attributes.review: I am first off extremely offended by this Cheeto and it’s blatant racism for anyone that isn’t an orange/white Cheeto. This is a puffed Cheeto but is supported by puffed and regular white and orange Cheetos who also spread hatred to those who are actually good, kind, hardworking PEOPLE. These Cheetos are ignorant and view themselves as the best of society when in fact they are the problem(and have been for centuries). I don’t understand why there would be an app dedicated to this disgusting Cheeto when he is clearly an example of everything that is wrong with the US. This is the absolute worst and most offensive app on the App Store and should be DELETED.
attributes.title: Worst app ever invented in the history of the App Store
